Name: Partial containment relationship
Description: This type contains information about the amount a location is contained by another location.

Properties.Name: Area
Properties.Description: The area of partial containment (overlap) of the two locations.

Properties.Name: Partially contained by
Properties.Description: The location that partially contains the other location.

Properties.Name: Partially contains
Properties.Description: The location partially contained by the other location.

Properties.Name: Percent area
Properties.Description: The percentage of partial containment (overlap) of the partially-contained location. If this relationship is showing "Russia is partially contained by Europe", then this property should be the percent of Russia's area in Europe.
